name: Blobs Aventure the Second: GVHFKD
description:
Welcome to Blobs Aventure the Second: GVHFKD In this game you can roll, jump and bounce your way to victory (home)!

This game contains groundbreaking features like:

  • Jumping (just don't forget to aim correctly)
  • Rolling (whenever you want it or not)
  • Bouncing off walls (yay)

Disclamer: This game was only made in two days for a school project.
